column4: just installed Feisty on my Thinkpad. I can see my windows network but I'm not being authenticated
what method of authentication are you using?
The Windows machine has an account for this ubuntu user.
are you trying to access a share on the windows machine or actually log into the windows machine?
do you have anything crazy like smart-cards turned on or something?
on the windows box
nope. It ain't accepting my username/password. I'm still using the live cd. Does that matter?
Also, I've connected using Edgy before though I've had to configure Samba by hand
aaah... you're trying to use samba
didn't see the response
yeah, Feisty apparently comes with Samba by default which is very cool
haven't had any problems with authentication before
any ideas?
no ideas actually
other then perhaps a broken version of samba in feisty
that would suck though
head over to #ubuntu+1
they'd be able to help you
this room doesn't officially support feisty .... yet
after feisty gets released on the 19th ... feisty support should be here as well
sorry
